articles.author: Radifah Kabir
articles.title: 'Unbalanced' Genes Lead To Ageing, AI Analysis Of Multiple Species Reveals. Know What It Means - ABP Live
articles.description: It is important for cells to balance the activity of long and short genes. Longer genes are linked to longer lifespans, and shorter genes are linked to shorter lifespans, the study found.
